## Instalation

:::code-group

```bash [npm]
npm i @ethsign/spsdk
```

```bash [pnpm]
pnpm i @ethsign/spsdk
```

:::

## Quick Start

::::steps

### Determine the signing mode

Currently, the Sign Protocol supports 2 modes:

- OnChain:
- OffChain:

```ts twoslash
import { SpMode } from "@ethsign/sp-sdk";

// @noErrors
SpMode. // [!code focus]
//     ^|
```

### Setup your client

Firstly, set up your Client with a desired Chain.

```ts twoslash
import { SignProtocolClient, SpMode, EvmChains } from "@ethsign/sp-sdk";
import { privateKeyToAccount } from "viem/accounts";

const privateKey = "0xabc"; // [!code focus]
const account = privateKeyToAccount(privateKey); // [!code focus]

const client = new SignProtocolClient(SpMode.OnChain, { // [!code focus]
  chain: EvmChains.zetachainAthensTestnet, // [!code focus]
  account, // [!code focus]
}); // [!code focus]
```

### Create Scheme

```ts twoslash
import { SignProtocolClient, SpMode, EvmChains } from "@ethsign/sp-sdk";
import { privateKeyToAccount } from "viem/accounts";

const privateKey = "0xabc";
const account = privateKeyToAccount(privateKey);

const client = new SignProtocolClient(SpMode.OnChain, {
  chain: EvmChains.zetachainAthensTestnet,
  account,
});

// ---cut---
const schema = client
  .createSchema({
    name: "xxx",
    data: [{ name: "name", type: "string" }],
  })
  .then((result) => {
    console.log(result);
  });
```

### Create attestation

```ts twoslash
import { SignProtocolClient, SpMode, EvmChains } from "@ethsign/sp-sdk";
import { privateKeyToAccount } from "viem/accounts";

const privateKey = "0xabc";
const account = privateKeyToAccount(privateKey);

const client = new SignProtocolClient(SpMode.OnChain, {
  chain: EvmChains.zetachainAthensTestnet,
  account,
});

const schema = await client
  .createSchema({
    name: "xxx",
    data: [{ name: "name", type: "string" }],
  })

const attestation = await client.createAttestation({
  schemaId: schema.schemaId,
  data: { name: 'a' },
  indexingValue: 'xxx',
})
```

### Revoke attestation

```ts twoslash
import { SignProtocolClient, SpMode, EvmChains } from "@ethsign/sp-sdk";
import { privateKeyToAccount } from "viem/accounts";

const privateKey = "0xabc";
const account = privateKeyToAccount(privateKey);

const client = new SignProtocolClient(SpMode.OnChain, {
  chain: EvmChains.zetachainAthensTestnet,
  account,
});

const schema = await client
  .createSchema({
    name: "xxx",
    data: [{ name: "name", type: "string" }],
  })

const attestation = await client.createAttestation({
  schemaId: schema.schemaId,
  data: { name: 'a' },
  indexingValue: 'xxx',
})

// ---cut---
client.revokeAttestation(attestation.attestationId)
```
